languages.text:
"Если зришь Ты изъян во мне — сокруши меня,
Если знаешь Ты грех за мной — опали меня
Огнем яростным, огнем праведным.
Но если видишь Ты свет во мне — вознеси меня,
Если слышишь мольбу мою — одари меня
Гневом яростным, гневом праведным", {n}— голос Ардженты прекрасно поставлен и будто создан для пения гимнов и молитв, но сейчас она то и дело сбивается с дыхания от волнения.{/n}

"If Thou seest a flaw in me — smite me,
If Thou knowest a fall of mine — burn me
With flames of fury and righteousness.
But if Thou seest a light in me — grace me,
If Thou hearest this plea of mine — bless me
With wrath of fury and of righteousness." {n}Argenta's voice is sonorous, as if made for singing hymns and prayers, but right now she cannot seem to catch her breath, so overwhelmed with emotion is she.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Если зришь Ты изъян во мне — сокруши меня,
Если знаешь Ты грех за мной — опали меня
Огнем яростным, огнем праведным.
Но если видишь Ты свет во мне — вознеси меня,
Если слышишь мольбу мою — одари меня
Гневом яростным, гневом праведным", {n}— голос Ардженты прекрасно поставлен и будто создан для пения гимнов и молитв, но сейчас она то и дело сбивается с дыхания от волнения.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"If thou seest a flaw in me — smite me,
If thou knowest a sin of mine — burn me
With flames of fury and righteousness.
But if thou seest a light in me — grace me,
If thou hearest this plea of mine — bless me
With wrath of fury and righteousness." {n}Argenta's voice is sonorous, as if made for singing hymns and prayers, but right now she keeps losing her breath, overwhelmed with emotion.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text:
“如果你看到了我的缺陷，请惩罚我，
如果你看到了我的过错，请烧灼我，
让我沐浴在你愤怒与正义的烈焰中。
但如果你看到了我的明光，请庇佑我，
如果你听到了我的恳求，请祝福我，
让我沐浴在你愤怒与正义的烈焰中。”{n}阿洁塔的声音铿锵有力，仿佛生来就是为了颂唱赞美诗与祷告一般，但她狂热的祈祷让她几乎喘不过气来。她被强烈的感情淹没了。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If Thou seest a flaw in me — smite me,
If Thou knowest a fall of mine — burn me
With flames of fury and righteousness.
But if Thou seest a light in me — grace me,
If Thou hearest this plea of mine — bless me
With wrath of fury and of righteousness." {n}Argenta's voice is sonorous, as if made for singing hymns and prayers, but right now she cannot seem to catch her breath, so overwhelmed with emotion is she.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
“如果你看到了我的缺陷，请惩罚我，
如果你看到了我的罪过，请烧灼我，
让我沐浴在你愤怒与正义的烈焰中。
但如果你看到了我的明光，请庇佑我，
如果你听到了我的恳求，请祝福我，
让我沐浴在你愤怒与正义的烈焰中。”{n}阿洁塔的声音铿锵有力，仿佛生来就是为了颂唱赞美诗与祷告一般，但她狂热的祈祷让她几乎喘不过气来。她被强烈的感情淹没了。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text:
«Si ves en mí falta alguna, castígame.
Si he cometido cualquier falta, quémame
en las llamas de tu furia y la justicia.
Pero si acaso ves en mí luz alguna, agráciame.
Si has oído mi plegaria, bendíceme
con la cólera de tu furia y la justicia». {n}La voz de Argenta resuena como si estuviese hecha para entonar himnos y plegarias, pero ahora mismo, abrumada por la emoción, parece que le falta el aliento.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If Thou seest a flaw in me — smite me,
If Thou knowest a fall of mine — burn me
With flames of fury and righteousness.
But if Thou seest a light in me — grace me,
If Thou hearest this plea of mine — bless me
With wrath of fury and of righteousness." {n}Argenta's voice is sonorous, as if made for singing hymns and prayers, but right now she cannot seem to catch her breath, so overwhelmed with emotion is she.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
«Si ves en mí falta alguna, castígame.
Si he cometido cualquier pecado, quémame
en las llamas de tu furia y la justicia.
Pero si acaso ves en mí luz alguna, agráciame.
Si has oído mi plegaria, bendíceme
con la cólera de tu furia y la justicia». {n}La voz de Argenta resuena como si estuviese hecha para entonar himnos y plegarias, pero ahora mismo, abrumada por la emoción, parece que le falta el aliento.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text:
「汝が我に欠落を見出すならば…我を打ち砕き給え
汝が我の堕落を知り給うならば…憤怒と正義の炎で
我を焼き尽くし給え
しかし、汝が我に光を見出すならば…我に恵み給え
汝が我のこの訴えを聞き給うならば…我を祝福し給え
憤怒と正義の怒りで」{n}アルジェンタの声は、まるで賛美歌や祈りを歌うために作られたかのように厳かに響く。しかし今の彼女は、感極まったあまりに息を継ぐことすらできないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If Thou seest a flaw in me — smite me,
If Thou knowest a fall of mine — burn me
With flames of fury and righteousness.
But if Thou seest a light in me — grace me,
If Thou hearest this plea of mine — bless me
With wrath of fury and of righteousness." {n}Argenta's voice is sonorous, as if made for singing hymns and prayers, but right now she cannot seem to catch her breath, so overwhelmed with emotion is she.{/n}

しかし、汝が我に光を見出すならば…我に恵み給え

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text:
"Wenn Ihr einen Makel in mir entdeckt – zerschmettert mich.
Wenn Ihr von einem Fehltritt meinerseits wisst – verbrennt mich
mit den Flammen des Zorns und der Rechtschaffenheit.
Aber wenn Ihr ein Licht in mir entdeckt – gewährt mir Eure Gnade.
Wenn Ihr diese Bitte von mir hört – segnet mich
mit der Wut des Zorns und der Rechtschaffenheit." {n}Argentas Stimme ist sonor, wie geschaffen zum Singen von Hymnen und das Gebet, doch im Moment kann sie kaum richtig atmen, so sehr wird sie von ihren Emotionen überwältigt.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If Thou seest a flaw in me — smite me,
If Thou knowest a fall of mine — burn me
With flames of fury and righteousness.
But if Thou seest a light in me — grace me,
If Thou hearest this plea of mine — bless me
With wrath of fury and of righteousness." {n}Argenta's voice is sonorous, as if made for singing hymns and prayers, but right now she cannot seem to catch her breath, so overwhelmed with emotion is she.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Wenn Ihr einen Makel in mir entdeckt – zerschmettert mich.
Wenn Ihr von einer Sünde in mir wisst – verbrennt mich
mit den Flammen des Zorns und der Rechtschaffenheit.
Aber wenn Ihr ein Licht in mir entdeckt – gewährt mir Eure Gnade.
Wenn Ihr diese Bitte von mir hört – segnet mich
mit der Wut des Zorns und der Rechtschaffenheit." {n}Argentas Stimme ist sonor, wie geschaffen zum Singen von Hymnen und das Gebet, doch im Moment kann sie kaum richtig atmen, so sehr wird sie von ihren Emotionen überwältigt.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text:
« Si Vous voyez en moi un vice, châtiez-moi,
Si Vous savez que j'ai péché, brûlez-moi
Dans les flammes de la fureur et de la vertu.
Mais si Vous voyez en moi la lumière, honorez-moi,
Si vous entendez ma supplique, bénissez-moi
Par le courroux de la fureur et de la vertu. » {n}La voix d'Argenta est vibrante, comme si elle était faite pour chanter des hymnes et des prières. En cet instant pourtant, elle semble avoir du mal à reprendre son souffle tant elle est submergée par l'émotion.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If Thou seest a flaw in me — smite me,
If Thou knowest a fall of mine — burn me
With flames of fury and righteousness.
But if Thou seest a light in me — grace me,
If Thou hearest this plea of mine — bless me
With wrath of fury and of righteousness." {n}Argenta's voice is sonorous, as if made for singing hymns and prayers, but right now she cannot seem to catch her breath, so overwhelmed with emotion is she.{/n}

languages.text:
"Bir kusurumu gördüysen kına beni.
Düştüğüme tanık olduysan yak beni.
Hiddet ve erdemin alevleri beni yakıp kavursun.
Ancak yüreğimdeki ışığı gördüysen fazıl et beni.
Yakarışlarımı işittiysen kutsa beni.
Hiddet ve erdemin gazabı yolumu aydınlatsın." {n}Argenta'nın sesinin tınısı, ilahi ve duaları zikretmek için yaratılmış gibi yankılanıyor. Ancak duygularına hâkim olamadığından nefes nefese kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"If Thou seest a flaw in me — smite me,
If Thou knowest a fall of mine — burn me
With flames of fury and righteousness.
But if Thou seest a light in me — grace me,
If Thou hearest this plea of mine — bless me
With wrath of fury and of righteousness." {n}Argenta's voice is sonorous, as if made for singing hymns and prayers, but right now she cannot seem to catch her breath, so overwhelmed with emotion is she.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Bir kusurumu gördüysen kına beni.
Düştüğüme tanık olduysan yak beni.
Hiddetin ve erdemin alevleri beni yakıp kavursun.
Ancak yüreğimdeki ışığı gördüysen faziletini bahşet.
Yakarışlarımı işittiysen kutsa beni.
Hiddetin ve erdemin gazabı yolumu aydınlatsın." {n}Argenta'nın sesinin tınısı, ilahiler ve duaları zikretmek için yaratılmış gibi yankılanıyor. Ancak nefes nefese kalıyor, belli ki duygularına hâkim olamıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
